channel.title: Politics

item.description: Legal experts call Pentagon's 'double tap' strike on shipwrecked survivors a textbook war crime, questioning military lawyer's role in operation.

item.title: Morning Minute: Are Answers in the Offing? They're Certainly Overdue
PA school faces fury after Muslim club’s pro-Palestinian display leaves Jewish students ‘shaken’
item.description: Pennsylvania school faces backlash from Jewish parents after Muslim student club distributed keffiyahs and pro-Palestinian messaging at culture fair.

item.title: WATCH: Dem lawmaker thanks Trump for pardon, says it came as a surprise amid re-election bid
item.description: President Donald Trump pardoned Rep. Henry Cuellar, who was charged with accepting $600,000 in bribes from the Azerbaijan government.

item.title: House GOP launches blitz of bills to shut down CCP infiltration of US schools: 'Commonsense'
item.description: House Republicans advance bills targeting Chinese Communist Party influence in U.S. schools. Legislation aims to protect students from CCP propaganda.

item.title: Stefanik Takes Aim at Johnson as N.Y. Governor Bid Heats Up
item.description: With her campaign for the New York governorship officially underway, Republican Rep. Elise Stefanik is reasserting herself in Congress.
